reviewText: I really like Brian Johnson....But the AC DC years with the legendary Bon Scott are BY FAr their best years....THe band was young, full of energy.....and the truth is that the AC DC sound was way different with Bon Scotts vocal style!!! AC DC with Bon Scott is a collection of live shows from AC DC in 1977 and 1978( Their pinnacle!!!) with their greatest hits at the time( Before Highway to Hell).....Highly recommended for AC DC lovers all around this world!!!!
